729502f-b.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Nicholas Avenue
729502f-b.text:
(1)  2328 Richmond Terrace, adjoihing the S.W. corner of Nicholas Avenue, siowing the Israel D. Johnson house.
March 1924
P.L.Sperr
(2)
The same, looking west.
Sept. 28, 1924
By William T. Davis through P.L.Sperr
(3)
A view of the rear ot the house, as seen from Nicholas Avenue. Also shown is the Bayonne Bridge.
Sept. 6, 1936
P.L.Sperr
729502f-b.folder: Richmond Terrace & Nicholas Avenue, Staten Island, NY
